palette¶

Contains functions, which extract colors from an image.

Author: Marek Dohnal

Date: 17/03/2023

palette.img_to_palette(colored_img_path)¶

Extracts colors from an image.

Parameters:

colored_img_path – path to an image, from which colors are extracted.

Returns:

list of colors and their cummulative occurences

auto-vasarely
